column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We had Henry serve us recently for my sister in law's birthday dinner and he was so kind & attentive! He made sure we were educated with the menu and was so patient when we were indecisive. The food here
column2: ya'll... just go try it out for yourself. Everything may seem small at first look but trust me
column3: I can never get through half of my meal without having a huge food baby and same for anyone I've ever taken here! For appetizers
column4: the cornbread Madeline's are my favorite! Something about that huckleberry cream butter with sea salt that just makes me so happy. I usually always get the shrimp & grits as my main meal
column5: so creamy & the shrimp is always fresh. It also has the perfect amount of spice to it too.
